meanings.definition: Present in large quantities; more than enough.
meanings.sent1: The garden had an overabundant supply of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store had an overabundant selection of fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket was so overabundant with snacks that it could feed an army!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an overabundant fountain, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The overflowing river carried an overabundant amount of water downstream.

meanings.sent1: The overabundant rain caused flooding in the streets.
meanings.sent2: Her overabundant enthusiasm for the project was contagious.
meanings.sent3: The overabundant toppings on the pizza made it difficult to eat!
meanings.sent4: His overabundant energy was like a wildfire, spreading to everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The overabundant decorations in the room created a festive atmosphere.
